alert.note: Alert for Manatee; Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 11 at 2:41AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Florida, including the following counties, Manatee and Sarasota. * WHEN...Until 545 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 241 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sarasota, Bradenton, North Sarasota, Kensington Park, Southgate, Ridge Wood Heights, The Meadows, Sarasota Springs, South Sarasota, Sarasota Bradenton Airport, South Gate Ridge, Gulf Gate Estates, Lake Sarasota, West Samoset, South Bradenton, West Bradenton, Desoto Lakes, Fruitville, Bee Ridge and Bayshore Gardens. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
